instructions: put the dinner fork on the lower left of the tablecloth, with the prongs pointing up.
put the knife on the tablecloth, to the right of the dinner fork, with the blade pointing left.
put the salad fork on the tablecloth, to the left of the dinner fork, with the prongs pointing up
put the salad knife on the tablecloth, to the right of the dinner knife with the blade pointing left
put the soup spoon on the tablecloth, to the right of the salad knife, with the bowl facing up
put the dessert spoon at the top center of the tablecloth with the bowl pointing left
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon, with the bowl pointing up
move the dessert spoon to the top center of the tablecloth with the bowl pointing left
place the dinner plate between the dinner fork and dinner knife, below the dessert spoon
place the bread plate above the salad fork and to the left of the dessert spoon
place the butter knife on the bread plate, with the blade pointing diagonally, up and right
place the wine glass above to the soup spoon
place the water glass to the right of the dessert spoon, and to the left of the wine glass
place the folded napkin vertically on the dinner plate
